description:
This market refers to the Valorant match between Shopify Rebellion Black and Evil Geniuses Academy in the VCL North America Playoffs, scheduled for February 17 at 4:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Evil Geniuses Academy" if Evil Geniuses Academy wins 2 or more maps than Shopify Rebellion Black in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Shopify Rebellion Black". 

Maps won by forfeit, disqualification, walkover, or default are counted towards the handicap, provided that the match is completed.

If the match is canceled (not played at all for any reason), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's match forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends due to the clinching map being forfeited this will count as a completed match.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://vlr.gg. However, if https://vlr.gg has not published final results within 2 hours after the eventâ€™s conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead including video evidence.

events.description:
This market refers to the Valorant match between Shopify Rebellion Black and Evil Geniuses Academy in the VCL North America Playoffs, scheduled for February 17 at 4:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Shopify Rebellion Black" if Shopify Rebellion Black win the match against Evil Geniuses Academy.

This market will resolve to "Evil Geniuses Academy" if Evil Geniuses Academy win the match against Shopify Rebellion Black.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/valorant/Main_Page.
events.title: Valorant: Shopify Rebellion Black vs Evil Geniuses Academy (BO3) - VCL North America Playoffs
